front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Acceptance and Maintenance of Natural Ester Fluids in Transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The evaluation and handling procedures for natural ester transformer insulating fluids are covered. The guideÂ¿s purpose is to assist the transformer operator in evaluating the serviceability of new, unused fluids being received by the equipment manufacturer or service company and fluid in new equipment. It also assists the operator in maintaining the fluids in serviceable condition.
